reviewText: This was a Christmas present.  I hope the person likes it.

I really like this set of dvd's especially since this series is no longer on television. I always watched this show when it was still on television. There was some really good actors on that show. It was always a show I could count on that I liked between the story line and the great acting .
this marathon is truly a delight. we have enjoyed every minute of it.
This is the best! has 32 episodes! if you love heat of the night! great collecter item, thanks amazon!
i think my brother will love it
GREAT SET! YES THE EPISODES ARE SCATTERED AROUND.. BUT THIS IS STILL ONE GREAT SET FROM ONE OF THE BEST TV SHOWS EVER!!!
I was addicted to In The Heat of The Night when it was on television. I am so happy I was able to purchase The whole box set.
